body_html: The official Guide(https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/datasets) is different from that on master branch (tensorflow/tensorflow/docs_src/programmers_guide/datasets.md).The usage example from master branch is right.Can you update the official Guide? Additionally, why can't the API convert the list to tuple automatically?

body: The official  Guide(https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/datasets) is different from that on master branch (tensorflow/tensorflow/docs_src/programmers_guide/datasets.md).The usage example from master branch is right.Can you update the official Guide? Additionally, why can't the API convert the list to tuple automatically?
